projectGridLines.title: Project 1 Title: Documentation and Analysis
projectGridLines.description: Description: The project focuses on gathering employee feedback and analyzing it to gain insights into employee satisfaction, engagement, and areas of improvement within the organization. The goal is to assess the overall employee experience, identify potential issues or opportunities, and develop strategies to enhance employee satisfaction and productivity. Skill sets: Word, Excel, Organizational psychology, Design Traits expectation: Communication Skills, Creative Writing. Chess Expected learning: Corporate Culture, Team Work, Employee engagement strategies Specific courses required for project execution: Science, Technology and Modernity. Introductory Psychology

projectGridLines.title: Project 2 Title: Marketing Campaign
projectGridLines.description: Description: The project aims to develop a comprehensive advertising campaign that utilizes both print and audio-visual mediums. The goal is to create engaging and impactful advertisements that effectively communicate the message to the target audience. The campaign will include print advertisements for various print media outlets and audio-visual advertisements for television, online platforms, or cinema. Skill sets: Creative Thinking, Media planning. Visual Design, Team Work Traits expectation: Communication Skills, Creative Writing, Football Expected learning: Creative concept development, Integrated campaign execution, Collaboration and teamwork, Media buying and negotiation Specific courses required for project execution: Print Audio and Visual Advertising. Statistical Inference and Applications

projectGridLines.title: Project 3 Title: International Client Research
projectGridLines.description: Description: The project involves conducting comprehensive research on international dients to gain insights into their needs, preferences, and market trends. The goal is to gather valuable information that will inform business strategies, marketing campaigns, and product development to cater to the international client base effectively. Skill sets: Research, Data Analysis, Communication, International Relations Traits expectation: Communication Skills, Creative Writing. Swimming Expected learning: Cross Cultural Intelligence, Team Work, Client Management, Statistics Specific courses required for project execution: International Relations, Environmental Pollution Control

projectGridLines.title: Project 4 Title: Social Media Campaign
projectGridLines.description: Description: The Social Media Campaign project aims to create and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy on various social media platforms to promote a product, service, or brand. The project will involve developing engaging content, managing social media accounts, analyzing metrics, and implementing targeted advertising campaigns. Skill sets: Social media management, Content creation, Graphic design, Mass Communication Traits expectation: Communication Skills, Creative Writing, Athletics Expected learning: Design principles, Strategic planning, Understanding social media algorithms Specific courses required for project execution: Print, Audio and Visual Advertising: Pattern Recognition

projectGridLines.title: Project 5 Title: Program Manager
projectGridLines.description: Description: The Program Manager will oversee all aspects of this advertising program, acting as the central point of contact and ensuring seamless collaboration between internal and external teams (e.g.. creative agencies, media buyers). They will be developing the program charter and overall strategy and managing project budgets. Skill sets: Excel, Word, PPT Traits expectation: Communication Skills, People Management Expected learning: Management, JIRA, Operations Management Specific courses required for project execution: Human Resource Development, Print. Audio and Visual Advertising
